Title: The effect of attachment security priming and oxytocin on physiological responses to trauma films and subsequent intrusions
Author: Karl, Anke; Carnelley, Katherine B.; Arikan, Gizem; Baldwin, David S.; Heinrichs, Markus; Stopa, Lusia
ExperimentalCondition: Oxytocin + Secure priming (think and write about an attachment figure)
ComparisonCondition: Placebo + Secure priming (think and write about an attachment figure)
ResultSummary: No group difference on diary distress between OT + secure priming and PL + secure priming group
PhysioMeasures: Heart rate response; Skin conductance level

Title: Accelerated forgetting of a trauma-like event in healthy men and women after a single dose of hydrocortisone
Author: Hennessy, Vanessa E.; Troebinger, Luzia; Iskandar, Georges; Das, Ravi K.; Kamboj, Sunjeev K.
Notes_fromMo: Results reported based on day-by-day changes
